remarks: Function-builder for derivative: restrict a derivative to a subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvmptres3.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvmptres3.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptres3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. J ) $.
dvmptres3.y $e |- ( ph -> ( S i^i X ) = Y ) $.
dvmptres3.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptres3.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptres3.d $e |- ( ph -> ( CC _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptres3 $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. Y |-> A ) ) = ( x e. Y |-> B ) ) $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
